Detailed Description

This singleton class manages most aspects of the chunky scene graph.

It contains most of the API that classes outside the chunk library will need to use. It manages the universe that the game runs.

A universe defines the world for a whole game - both the client and the server run only one universe. Each universe is split up into a number of named spaces.

void ChunkManager::addChunkToSpace ( Chunk *  pChunk,
ChunkSpaceID  spaceID 
)

Adds a chunk to the given space.

If called from the background thread, this is queued up to be added later on the main thread.
